enhanced_by.reason: The words method relies on the word method to generate individual words, indicating a strong state dependency.
The word method internally calls resolve to fetch words, suggesting that resolve might need to be tested or mocked in the context of words.
Both words and sentence methods generate text content, making sentence a good candidate for asserting the correctness of the words method.
Both methods involve generating text, though characters focuses on individual characters rather than words, which can still inform assertions.
